DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Face Paint - Teal 499 (75 ml)
DescriptionData.Description:
Teal Face Paint from Snazaroo applies evenly like glass and can be easily blended into the skin. The Snazaroo Face paint colors dry in about 30 seconds so they are a streak-free, polished and durable finish. Snazaroo "Classic" Face Paints are Snazaroo's traditional colors.
Snazaroo Face Paints are hypoallergenic and the world's safest face paints, meeting U.S. FDA, Canadian, and European standards for cosmetic safety and the only face paint with a Child Toy Safety Rating. Snazaroo paint is a non-toxic and easy to use face paint that is water-based, fragrance-free and washes off easily.
Snazaroo Teal Face Paint gives brightly colored, totally opaque coverage and comes in a 2.54 ounces (75 ml) size container.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 2.54 ounces (75 ml) Snazaroo Face Paint Container is good for 400 full faces or 2,000 cheek art designs (approx. 2in x 2in size).
Tons of colors to choose from
One of the most popular face paints in the world
